texts.name: Floribert
texts.biography: Floribert is regarded as one of Enroth's finest field surgeons, having introduced numerous new tools that speed up manipulations and therefore alleviate the suffering of the wounded. Floribert gets a steady supply of practicing material from his girlfriend Victoria's experiments.

specialty.description: Receives a 5% per level bonus to First Aid Tent healing efficiency.
